Summary: When we first saw it, it looked like a cylinder but seemed to change shape as light hit it .
divs: Sighting Detailsmy family and i were at my brothers house in marysville washington, my wife and i were just getting ready to leave when 4 small bi-planes flew by and we were watching them when i noticed something strange in the sky behind where they had just flown by i said to my brother hey do you see that , that thing in the sky? he did and soon everyone was looking at it we didnt have anything to use to see it better and my camcorder couldnt pick it up but we could just make it out with the naked eye to me it looked chevron shaped,to my wife she saw cylinder, my brother and his wife saw round or disc it seemed to change shape and color as we watched it it did not seemed to move much so i had time to get binoculars and look at it to me it was more chevron shaped we all watched it for several minutes and we were all shouting ,its a ufo,its a ufo but we all saw a different shape to the object as the light changed and the angle we saw it the object was moving very slowly and hoovering for quite some time so we all got to see it clearly for about ten minutes until we finally lost sight of it behind some trees we all talked about what we saw and we all agreed that it was a "u.f.o." we were all excited and talked about what we saw for half an hour i checked my recorder but couldnt see anything a bit disapointed but we knew what we saw
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Marysville
There were no other sightings in Marysville on or around July 10th 2010
